options_id_label_latest_query.message: Restore the latest query when you open the popup.

options_id_p_tags_0.message: If there are descriptions like {{code:[tag]}} in the head of bookmark titles, they are treated as tags.

options_id_p_tags_1.message: For example, {{code:[google]}} and {{code:[search]}} are the tags if the title is {{code:[google][search]google}}.

options_id_p_search_1.message: If you input a word like {{code:[hoge]}}, it will be searched as folder or tag.

options_id_p_search_2.message: For example, If you search with {{code:[IT]}}, you can exclude bookmark whose title is {{code:Italy}} from search result.

options_id_p_search_3.message: Search target is folders and titles (includes tags). URLs are excluded.

options_id_p_edit_0.message: In the search result, you can edit bookmark titles.
